docs.snippet: Giants running back David Wilson, sidelined since October, announced he had been cleared to resume full contact workouts, with the team’s first full practice of training camp Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Giants running back David Wilson, sidelined since October, announced he had been cleared to resume full contact workouts, with the team’s first full practice of training camp Tuesday.
docs.abstract: New York Giants running back David Wilson, sidelined since October 2013 with neck injury that required surgery, is cleared to resume full-contact workouts.

headline.main: Coming Off Neck Surgery, Wilson Is Set For Contact
headline.print_headline: Coming Off Neck Surgery, Wilson Is Set for Contact

docs.snippet: Chris Snee of the Giants, a son-in-law of Coach Tom Coughlin, ended his 10-year career as a right guard after winning two Super Bowls and appearing in four Pro Bowls....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Snee of the Giants, a son-in-law of Coach Tom Coughlin, ended his 10-year career as a right guard after winning two Super Bowls and appearing in four Pro Bowls.
docs.abstract: Bill Pennington On Pro Football examines decision by New York Giants right guard Chris Snee to retire following a stellar 10-year career; notes that Snee, son-in-law of coach Tom Coughlin, decided that his body had reached its limit after several injuries and surgeries.

headline.main: Snee Retires After Two Rings and Too Many Injuries

docs.snippet: In a court filing, seven retired N.F.L. players say the current settlement does not adequately cover all retirees because only those with a limited number of illnesses will be eligible for cash awards....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a court filing, seven retired N.F.L. players say the current settlement does not adequately cover all retirees because only those with a limited number of illnesses will be eligible for cash awards.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; seven retired NFL players ask appeals court to intervene in proposed concussion settlement, arguing that only those with a limited number of illnesses, like Parkinson's disease, will be eligible for cash rewards; other football news noted.

headline.main: 7 Retirees Ask Court to Intervene on Concussion Settlement
headline.print_headline: Saying Concussion Settlement Is Inadequate, Seven Retirees Ask Court to Intervene

docs.snippet: The FIFA prosecutor Michael Garcia’s report into allegations of bidding corruption tied to the 2018 and 2022 World Cups has been delayed by several weeks....
docs.lead_paragraph: The FIFA prosecutor Michael Garcia’s report into allegations of bidding corruption tied to the 2018 and 2022 World Cups has been delayed by several weeks.
docs.abstract: FIFA announces that report into allegations of bidding corruption tied to the 2018 and 2022 World Cups will be delayed for several weeks; other soccer news noted.

headline.main: Ethics Report on 2018 and 2022 World Cups Is Delayed

docs.snippet: A day after Tony Dungy was largely skewered for saying he would not have drafted openly gay linebacker Michael Sam, the former NFL coach clarified his comments and provided context....
docs.lead_paragraph: A day after Tony Dungy was largely skewered for saying he would not have drafted openly gay linebacker Michael Sam, the former NFL coach clarified his comments and provided context.

docs.snippet: Johnny Manziel has found instant popularity since being drafted in the first round by the Cleveland Browns, but will have to wait until August to find out if he has the starting quarterback job....

headline.main: 'Johnny Football' Manziel Has a Month to Win Browns QB Job
headline.print_headline: 'Johnny Football' Manziel Has a Month to Win Browns QB Job

docs.snippet: Brazil named Dunga as their manager for the second time on Tuesday, two weeks after they were hammered 7-1 by Germany in the World Cup semi-finals, a result which led to the resignation of former coach Luiz Felipe Scolari....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil named Dunga as their manager for the second time on Tuesday, two weeks after they were hammered 7-1 by Germany in the World Cup semi-finals, a result which led to the resignation of former coach Luiz Felipe Scolari.

headline.main: Dunga Succeeds Scolari as Brazil Manager
headline.print_headline: Dunga Succeeds Scolari as Brazil Manager

headline.print_headline: World Cup Party Over but Summer of Soccer Set to Rock U.S

docs.snippet: Manchester City cancelled an under-21 game against Croatian side HNK Rijeka after an alleged incident of racist abuse against one of their players in the first half, the club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Manchester City Cancel Youth Game Due to Racism
headline.print_headline: Manchester City Cancel Youth Game Due to Racism

docs.snippet: Four Frenchmen, including former international Luis Fernandez, have been named on a shortlist of five prospective candidates to take over as national coach of the Ivory Coast, the country's football federation said....
